frameset.edef: adhering to\ maintaining\ being committed to

example.parse: (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_ACC التزام) (NP-SBJ (POSS_PRON_3MS ه)) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الضغط)) (PP-PRP (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN أجل) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN تسوية)) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN قضية) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الجزيرة)) (SBAR (WHNP-5 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (DET+ADJ.VN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المقسمة) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-5)) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *-5)) (PP-TMP (PREP منذ) (NP (NOUN_NUM 1974)))))))))))))))))))))))))))))

arg.g: to put pressure for a settlement to the issue of the divided island since 1974

example.arg: الضغط من اجل تسوية لقضية الجزيرة المقسمة منذ 1974
